Description: We are hiring a Project & Installation Engineer for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Marine Engineering, or any related field.
Minimum 5 to 10 years of experience in Project Engineering (detailed phase) from leading EPCIC companies.
Fully conversant with MS Office and web applications, AutoCAD, other engineering software (Orcaflex, Sacs, Mose, Abaqus), and Oracle applications.
Strong knowledge of mechanical, structural, and SURF.
Proficient in FEA modeling and strong knowledge of OrcaFlex software.
Strong knowledge of related health, safety, security, and environmental regulations.
Good understanding of Quality Management Systems, such as ISO 9001.
Mandatory to possess a valid Qatar driving license to attend site visits as and when required.
Business fluent in English – both written and spoken is required. Arabic is a plus.
With a valid visa and QID
Residing in Qatar
